title: Oru Kili Oru Kili Lyrics Leelai
stanzas:
Oru Kili Oru Kili Song Lyrics #Leelai
#ShreyaGhosal

Oru kili oru kili
siru kili
unnai thodave anumadhi

oru thuli oru thuli
siru thuli
vazhigiradhe vizhi vazhi

Unakkul naan vaazhum
vivaram naan kandu
viyakkiren viyakkiren

Enakku naan alla
unakku than
endru unargiren
Nizhal ena thodargiren

oru kili oru kili
siru kili
unnai thodave anumathi

oru thuli oru thuli
siru thuli
vazhigirathe vizhi vazhi

Vizhiyalla, viral ithu
oru madalthaan
varainthathu
uyir alla uyil ithu
unakkuthaan uriyathu

Imaigalin idaiyil nee
imaipathai naan thavirkkiren.
vizhigalin vazhiyil nee
urakkam vanthal thadukkiren

Kadhalthaan ennaalum
oru vaarthaikul
varathathu

Kaalangal sendralumthan
vaanam pol vizhathathu

oru kili oru kili
Siru kili
unnai thodave anumathi
oru thuli oru thuli
siru thuli
vazhigirathe vizhi vazhi

Dhoorathu megathai
thurathi chellum
paravai pole.
thogaiye unnai
naan thediye
vanthen inge

Poigai pol
kidanthaval
paarvai yennum
kal yerinthai.
kalanginen
un kaiyil valaginen
ennai indre

Thozhiye un thegam
ilam thendralthan
thodathatho

Thozhane un kaigal
thoda naanamthaan
vidathatho

oru kili oru kili
Siru kili unnai
thodave anumathi
oru thuli oru thuli
siru thuli
vazhigirathe vizhi vazhi

Unakkul naan vaazhum
vivaram naan kandu
viyakkiren viyakkiren

Enakku naan alla
unakkuthaan
endru unargiren
Nizhal ena thodargiren

oru kili oru kili
Siru kili unnai
thodave anumathi
oru thuli oru thuli
siru thuli
vazhigirathe vizhi vazhi
